ccre.channel

Interface BooleanInput

  • All Superinterfaces:
    BooleanInputPoll
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BooleanStatus, MultipleSourceBooleanController, PauseTimer

    public interface BooleanInput
extends BooleanInputPoll
    A BooleanInput is a way to get the current state of a boolean input, and to subscribe to notifications of changes in the boolean input's value. BooleanInput is a subinterface of BooleanInputPoll.
    Author:
    skeggsc
    See Also:
    BooleanInputPoll

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void send(BooleanOutput output)
      Subscribe to changes in this boolean input's value.
      void unsend(BooleanOutput output)
      Unsubscribe from changes in this boolean input's value.

      • Methods inherited from interface ccre.channel.BooleanInputPoll

        get

    • Method Detail

      • send

        void send(BooleanOutput output)
        Subscribe to changes in this boolean input's value. The boolean output will be modified whenever the value of this input changes. If available, the current value of the input will be written at this time.
        Parameters:
        output - The boolean output to notify when the value changes.
        See Also:
        BooleanOutput.set(boolean), unsend(ccre.channel.BooleanOutput)

      • unsend

        void unsend(BooleanOutput output)
        Unsubscribe from changes in this boolean input's value. This reverses the actions of a previous send call.
        Parameters:
        output - The output to unsubscribe.
        See Also:
        send(ccre.channel.BooleanOutput)
